subject: missing items from my order
description_text:
Hello Simsonn,

today I received my order but it was missing the baseplate, heelplate and
the upgrade kit, that was also a part of the order. So I only received the
pedals, even though the order said to have included all of the items listed
above.

Kind regards
Aaron Conrad

conversations.body_text: Hi Aaron Conrad,    We apologize, but the Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We have shipped it to you separately. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047114881829
